item.description:
lunch provided. Please check in at the volunteer tent, which will be located to the left of the Hatch Shell, at 10:00AM.

We've done this for the past two years and have volunteered at the company tent and also as course monitors. It's a morning event on 9/15. We've also had a team walk in the past too. If there's interest from the club, please feel free to contact Alecia directly with the number of volunteers.

2012 Event Schedule: 9/15/2012
9:00am: Heart Bank Opens for Donation Turn-In 9/15/2012
9:45am: Opening Ceremonies 9/15/2012
10:00am: Red Cap Wave 9/15/2012
9:00am-1:00pm: Sponsored Activities 9/15/2012
10:30am: 6-Mile Walk Begins! 9/15/2012
11:00am: 1- and 2-Mile Walks Begin! 9/15/2012
12:00pm-1:00pm: Live performance by the Adam Ezra Group (www.adamezra.com) 9/15/2012
1:00pm: Walk Concludes

group.name: Boston Rotaract - A Service/Social Club for 18-30 Yr Olds

item.name: Course Monitors for Heart Walk
